reporter-output.line: Open url 'http://update.qa5.nbcupublisher7.publisher7.com'.
Enter the user's email address in the 'Email Address' text box.
Enter the user's password in the 'Password' text box.
Click the 'Login' button.
Mouse over the 'Configuration' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Media' menu link.
Click the 'Media: thePlatform mpx settings' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Media: thePlatform mpx settings dialog'.
Check if the 'Connect to MPX' button is present. If not then MPX has not been previously enabled.
Get all the selected import account options and store to a list.
Open the mpx data client at http://data.player.theplatform.com/player/client.
Enter the Username in the 'Username' text box.
Enter the Password in the 'Password' text box.
Click the 'Sign In' button.
Click the Account Picker button.
Click the 'DB TV' account check box.
Select 'Player' from the 'Object' drop down list.
Enter 'title, disabled' in the 'Fields' text box.
Click the 'Submit' button.
Store the result set to a list.
Open url 'http://update.qa5.nbcupublisher7.publisher7.com'.
Mouse over the 'Content' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Files' menu link.
Click the 'mpxMedia' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Content dialog'.
Click the 'Sync MPX Media' link.
Select 'Auditude Demo player' from the first 'Import Player' drop down list.
Click the 'Sync MPX Media Now' link.
Verify success message of 'Processed video import/update manually for all accounts.' is present.
Verify there are no errors present.
Click the 'Run Cron to complete import' link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Cron dialog'.
Click the 'Run Cron' button.
Verify success message of 'Cron run successfully.' is present.
Verify there are no errors present.
Mouse over the 'Content' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Files' menu link.
Click the 'mpxMedia' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Content dialog'.
Enter title Automation1.
Click the 'Apply' button.
Get the title text of every result in the search result set.
For each expected result, assert it is present in the result set.
